name: AVMediaCharacteristic
desc: A structure that defines media data characteristics.

items.name: static let audible: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option includes audible content.

items.name: static let containsAlphaChannel: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track contains an alpha channel.

items.name: static let containsHDRVideo: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track contains HDR video.

items.name: static let containsOnlyForcedSubtitles: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option presents only forced subtitles.

items.name: static let describesMusicAndSoundForAccessibility: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option includes legible content in the language of its specified locale.

items.name: static let describesVideoForAccessibility: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates the media includes audible content that describes the visual portion of the presentation.

items.name: static let dubbedTranslation: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option contains audio language or dialect translation of the original content.

items.name: static let easyToRead: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates a track or media selection option provides legible content that’s edited for easy reading.

items.name: static let frameBased: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option includes frame-based content.

items.name: static let isAuxiliaryContent: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates a track or media selection option includes content its author indicates is auxiliary to the asset’s presentation.

items.name: static let isMainProgramContent: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates a track or media selection option includes content its author indicates is essential to the asset’s presentation.

items.name: static let isOriginalContent: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option contains original content.

items.name: static let languageTranslation: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option contains a language or dialect translation of the original content.

items.name: static let legible: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option includes legible content.

items.name: static let transcribesSpokenDialogForAccessibility: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a media selection option includes legible content that transcribes spoken dialog.

items.name: static let usesWideGamutColorSpace: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track uses a wide-gamut color space.

items.name: static let visual: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option includes visual content.

items.name: static let voiceOverTranslation: AVMediaCharacteristic
items.desc: A media characteristic that indicates that a track or media selection option contains a language translation and verbal interpretation of spoken dialog.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a media characteristic.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a media characteristic with a string value.
